metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the macos-def:pwpolicy_test is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the macos-def:pwpolicy_test.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test that the pwpolicy_object is supported with the username, userpass, and directory_node entities equal to some value.

pwpolicy_test.comment: Test that the pwpolicy_object is supported with the username, userpass, and directory_node entities equal to some value.

pwpolicy_object.comment: This pwpolicy_object represents a pwpolicy_item with the username entity equal to 'root', the userpas entity equal to 'password', and the directory_node entity equal to '/Local/Default'.

pwpolicy_state.comment: This pwpolicy_state represents an pwpolicy_item which has a maxChars entity greater than or equal to '0', a maxFailedLoginAttempts entity less than or equal to '10', and requiresAlpha and requiresNumeric entities equal to 'true'.
